subject: Yankee Stadium (NYC)
Baseball
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: Visitors to the new Yankee Stadium will see many reminders of the old park, from the identical field dimensions and the Yankee-blue seats to the trademark frieze that rims the upper deck.
snippet: Visitors to the new Yankee Stadium will see many reminders of the old park, from the identical field dimensions and the Yankee-blue seats to the trademark frieze that rims the upper deck.
